definition: the mission in life of a deceased person, left to others to carry on
to lose/to leave behind/to omit/to bequeath/sth lost/involuntary discharge (of urine etc)

sentences.english: Although he is no longer with us, his legacy will live on forever.
sentences.chinese: 雖然他不再與我們同在，他的遺志將永存後世。

sentences.english: That must be the legacy of those we have lost.
sentences.chinese: 這一定是我們掉去的那些人的遺志。

sentences.english: He followed in his father's footsteps, but his gait was somewhat erratic.
sentences.chinese: 他繼承了乃父的遺志，惟其步態似乎有些搖晃不定。
